data.actual_result: Text doesn’t wrap when hitting the scroll bar area, creating a bleeding effect where the text and scroll bar overlap
data.expected_result: Text wraps before the scroll bar area
data.short_description: Text overlaps scrollbar in message fields, and ban reasons (requires the right amount of characters to repro with your screen size)
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a message in the message field long enough to generate a scroll bar (I found copy pasting the example bug report worked for me) - Make sure you you characters that go onto right edge of the message area - After you get enough text to generate a scroll bar, start scrolling up and down, watching the scroll bar - If you can’t repro on the first try, try typing enough text to where the last character moves the word to a new line, and try replacing it with letters until you find one that doesn’t go to a new line
